alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:11AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Simpson and Copiah Counties. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Monticello. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 26.5 feet, Flooding occurs near the Highway 84 bridge at the Atwood Water Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 26.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 24.1 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Monticello 22.0 26.3 Sat 8 am CST 26.1 25.9 25.4 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CST.
